title: How can I keep a balance between enjoyment and studies in medical college?
description: Answer (1 of 7): NOTE:This answer is not for nerds 1)It is very important to keep balance during medicine bcause you will repent in the end of it if you have given more time to any of them . 2)Don't listen to seniors as most of them keep yourself on a wrong track .Just follow the seniors on whi...
